channel.title: Centos 6.4 on purpleidea.com

item.title: Upgrading to centos 6.4 with shorewall onboard
item.description: In case you upgrade your CentOS 6.x box to version 6.4, the shorewall service might complain. With a scary message: ERROR: Your kernel/iptables do not include state match support. No version of Shorewall will run on this system This is selinux at work, and the problem can easily be solved by running: # restorecon -Rv /sbin Thanks shorewall-users and Happy hacking, James You can hire James and his team at m9rx corporation.
